Package Database.trades

Class Trade

java.lang.Object
Database.DatabaseItem
Database.trades.Trade
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Trade
extends DatabaseItem
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a trade between two users
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Trade

      public Trade​(java.lang.String firstUserId, java.lang.String secondUserId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String firstUserOffer, java.lang.String secondUserOffer, int allowedEdits)
      Saves user ids
      Parameters:
      firstUserId - the user id of the person initializing the trade
      secondUserId - the user id of the person the trade is being sent to
      meetingTime - when the meeting takes place
      secondMeetingTime - when the second meeting takes place
      meetingLocation - where the meeting takes place
      firstUserOffer - the item id that the user who initialized the trade is willing to offer
      secondUserOffer - the item id that the user who got sent the trade is willing to offer
      allowedEdits - number of edits allowed before the trade is cancelled
